name: Rock Paper Roguelike
description:
A roguelike deckbuilder where you try to get as deep into a dungeon as possible. In order to defeat the enemies found within, you have the power of Rock Paper Scissors (RPS) on your side.

The dungeon contains several rooms on each floor. Each room can contain enemies, treasures or other things to improve your deck. At the end of each floor is a boss that guards the stairs up to the next floor.

The battles are done using double blind selection of the typical RPS signs with some added special moves. The cards are two-sided with some cards having additional effects on the other side that can be used instead of the regular RPS sign.

This is a prototype which I built because I wanted to play around with levels building up using blocks every time you switch room. I used RPS to build a simple deckbuilding framework around. The game is mainly built for mobile but also works for PC using the mouse.
